channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How ‘Conjuring: Last Rites’ Inspired Vera Farmiga’s Haunting New Song
item.description: "The Conjuring: Last Rites" star Vera Farmiga's group The Yagas have released a chilling song, "Illusion," to complement the release of the blockbuste...

item.title: AI Is Becoming Private Equity’s New Playbook
item.description: Private equity firms are weaving AI into sourcing and diligence, but the question is whether it creates real returns or just more hype.

item.title: Fintech Home Equity Lender Aven Doubles Valuation To $2.2 Billion
item.description: The San Francisco startup grafts a home equity line of credit (HELOC) onto a credit card. It has issued $3 billion in loans, up from $1.5 billion a ye...

item.title: iPhone 17 Debuts As Apple’s Biggest Base Model Upgrade In Years
item.description: Apple's iPhone 17 narrows the gap with the Pro models, adding ProMotion, dual 48MP cameras, and more at the same $799 starting price.

item.title: You Must Play ‘I Am Your Beast’ On Xbox Game Pass Right Now
item.description: 'I Am Your Beast', the self-described “shortform covert revenge thriller FPS,” proves to be the single best addition to Game Pass in months.

item.title: Making a point

item.description: Everyone is always doing their best. Given their situation, priorities, and awareness (the circumstances), people make choices. If we want to change h...

item.title: False scarcity
item.description: Often, the things we want the most aren’t directly related to the things we need. In fact, they might be very similar to things we already have. Wants...

item.title: System architect/system victim

item.title: Self awareness and the luck-skill gap
item.description: One sort of delusion is believing that we’re smart and skilled simply because we got lucky. This perpetuates a cycle of bad decisions that just happen...
